titulo: En Busca Del Tiempo Perdido, Pt. 5 [In Search of Lost Time, Part 5]: La Prisionera (Texto Completo) [The Prisoner (Full Text)]
descripcion: This monumental masterpiece by Marcel Proust (1871-1922) is an immense portrait of an entire society and is considered as one of the greatest novels in all literature. As its title shows, Proust tried to recover in his work what the past had been, and in doing so, made an incisive analysis of his times, with unforgettable characters - most of them were based on his acquaintances. This work reflects one of the foremost travels through the subconscious ever written.
